title: Diamond Grinding Disc Wheel Stone Dresser Tool Dressing Bench Grinder
features: Features : Life-time guarantee. Createsvery little dust without chipping. Restores and prolongs the life of grinding wheels. Re-shapes worn Wheels to give true grinding surface.

Heavy duty diamond coated head with knurled handle for secure grip. Dresses across the width of grinding wheels to give a flatter surface. This diamond-coated dresser is a simple way of returning your grinding wheel to tip-top condition. To get the maximum performance from your bench grinder, it's imperative that the grinding wheels are regularly 'dressed' across their width to maintain their balance and ensure a 'true' grinding profile.
Specification : Material : Diamond coated + Metal Package includes : 1 x Diamond Stone Dresser Tool
